issue.title: N4196 Attributes for namespaces and enumerators, [tiny] Core issue 1657, Attributes for namespaces and enumerators

discussion.p: Issaquah 2014: EWG wants to point out that it's important to remember to consider inline namespaces and anonymous namespaces, and that the rationale for both namespaces and enumerators is [[deprecated]].
Discussed in Rapperswil 2014. Smith is encouraged to write a proposal for EWG review, EWG expects to send it towards CWG without much ado.
